text: All Is by My Side is a British and Irish drama movie about Jimi Hendrix. It was released in 2013. It was written and directed by John Ridley. ==Cast== * André 3000 as Jimi Hendrix * Hayley Atwell as Kathy Etchingham * Burn Gorman as Michael Jeffery * Imogen Poots as Linda Keith * Ruth Negga as Ida * Demetrice Jackson as Reed * Ashley Charles as Keith Richards * Amy De Bhrún as Phoebe * Clare-Hope Ashitey as Faye * Laurence Kinlan as John * Jade Yourell as Roberta Goldstein * Sam McGovern as Ted * Robbie Jarvis as Andrew Loog Oldham ==Other websites== * Category:2013 drama movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:2010s British drama movies Category:Irish biographical movies Category:Irish drama movies
title: All Is by My Side
